title: Carmen Hering D.O. - Osteopathic and Anthroposophic Medicine
cleaned_text: 4TH Annual Ito Wegman Gathering Online + In Person @ Hove Seeds, Los Angeles February 22nd 2022 11AM - 1:30PM PST Recent Posts [Love as a Creative Force Gathering](https://carmenheringdo.com/love-as-a-creative-force-gathering/) 4TH Annual Ito Wegman Gathering [Waldorf Development Conference](https://carmenheringdo.com/waldorf-development-conference/) The Education of the Etheric Body as the Foundation for Social Health Friday and Saturday, Nov 5-6 2021 [Foundation for Health Creation](https://carmenheringdo.com/foundation-for-health-creation-summer-newsletter/) Foundation for Health Creation co-founded by Dr. Carmen Hering Read Summer 2021: Fostering Community Through Agriculture on the Foundation for Health Creation Website.
